desc: Gz with da Krown is a Company that is Comprised of the Arizona Based Hip-Hop Group The Lyrical Gz. Gz with the Krown or G.C.L.I.C.K. for short is the Merchandising and Marketing Arm of Gz wit da Krown. We offer merchandise for the group as well as other products fans of the group might enjoy. So stop by and Blaze🔥🔥.

layout.text:
Street wear & merchandise that embodies the lifestyles of real street kings and queens.
"Heavy is the head that wears the krown"
